creator: soldier.kam@gmail.com
text: DataSource exposed by JNDI could be closed by any application. It will be handy to somehow prevent from this. Maybe it should be default behavior or maybe configuration attribute.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: The DataSource API does not provide a close method.

creator: soldier.kam@gmail.com
text: Yes, DataSource does not provide close method but implementations does. BasicDataSource implements AutoCloseable so close method is exposed to applications.
